question: Which of the following statements about Mohammad-bin-Tughlaq is correct?
option3: He was the ablest man among the crowned heads of the medieval age
answer: He was the ablest man among the crowned heads of the medieval age
explanation:
• Mohammad-bin-Tughlaq introduced token currency in brass and copper, in place of gold and silver. He was the ablest man of the medieval age.
• The first post office in India was established by British East India Company in Bombay in 1764.
